VADAMOS (FR) (Bay 2011-Stud 2017). 8 wins from 1600m to 2400m, Prix du Moulin de Longchamp, Gr.1. Leading Second Season Sire in NZ in 2021-22. Sire of 282 rnrs, 146 wnrs, inc. SW La Crique (Matamata RC Arrowfield Stud P., Gr.1), Spycatcher, Devastate, Grace's Secret, Art de Triomphe, Luisa Casati, SP Kazalark, Missy Moola, Warsaw, Caboche, Messidor, Permare, Wine Barron and of Miss Dynamite, Ivanka, etc.

1st dam

KALEIDOSCOPE, by Pins. 6 wins 1200m to 1600m, ARC Ideal Electrical Suppliers H., ATC Sportsyear Diary H., ARC Air Tahiti Nui H., Counties RC HR Fisken & Sons H., 2d ARC Westbury Club H. Blood-sister to LEGS (dam of WOLFWHISTLE), Tiptoes (dam of TIPTRONIC), half-sister to Maythehorsebemagic, World Exclusive (dam of EXCLUSIVE LASS), Lucky Mascot (dam of FLYING MASCOT, KOALA BEAR), Axiom (dam of XTRAVAGANT, HE'S REMARKABLE). This is her fourth foal. Her third foal is an unraced 3YO. Dam of two foals to race, both winners-

Prismatic (g. by Savabeel). 3 wins at 1600m, 2200m to 2023-24, Waikato RC Silverton Alexander H., Matamata RC AP Gollan Registered Valuers H., 2d CJC Commodore Hotel H., NZB Airfreight Road to Jericho H.

Kingfisher (g. by Savabeel). 3 wins at 1200m, 1400m in 2022-23, Auckland TR Haunui Farm H., Avondale JC Great Southern Television S.

2nd dam

ARLETTY, by Centaine. 8 wins 1150m to 2000m, NZ$72,800, A$340,250, AJC Villiers S., Gr.2, STC Queen of the Turf S., Gr.2, ARC Royal S., Gr.3, Ladies Mile, Gr.3, AJC Breeders' Classic, L, 2d AJC Angst H., L, ARC Soliloquy S., L. Sister to FIRETAINE, Spillway, River Century (dam of LEGS, GUYNO), three-quarter-sister to SIXTY SECONDS, SPOTTSWOODE, Centico. Dam of 13 foals, 11 to race, 9 winners, inc:-

Maythehorsebemagic (Zabeel). 12 wins-3 in succession-1400m to 3900m, 2d BRC Queen's Cup, Gr.3, VRC Andrew Ramsden S., L.

World Exclusive. 2 wins at 1716m, 1750m in Aust. Dam of 2 winners-

EXCLUSIVE LASS (Nicconi). 3 wins at 1100m, 1200m, A$189,200, Geelong RC Rosemont Stud S., L, 3d MRC How Now S., Gr.3. Dam of-

Boyfriend (Snitzel). Placed at 2, 2d ATC Todman S., Gr.2.

Lucky Mascot. Placed at 3 in Aust. Dam of 7 winners-

FLYING MASCOT (Tavistock). 6 wins 1300m to 1600m, A$565,525, VRC Matron S., Gr.3, MRC Mannerism S., Gr.3, MVRC Tesio S., Gr.3.

KOALA BEAR (Exceed and Excel). 2 wins-1 at 2-at 1050m, 1400m, A$98,703, SAJC Cinderella S., L, MRC Race-Tech H. Dam of 4 winners-

Marsupial - Street Cry Success (Sing.) (Street Cry). 10 wins-1 at 2-1100m to 1600m to 2023, 2d BRC Queensland Day P., L.

Arboreal. Placed at 3 in Aust. Dam of-

TROBRIAND (Kermadec). 4 wins-3 in succession at 2-1100m to 1400m to 2023-24, Waikato RC Eclipse S., Gr.2.

Axiom. Unraced. Dam of 7 winners-

XTRAVAGANT (Pentire). Champion 3YO in NZ in 2015-16. 6 wins-1 at 2 and 3 in succession-1200m to 1600m, NZ$467,500, A$15,000, New Zealand Two Thousand Guineas, Gr.1, Waikato Sprint, Gr.1. Sire.

HE'S REMARKABLE (Pentire). 6 wins 1300m to 1600m, NZ$270,625, A$361,900, Newcastle JC Newmarket H., Gr.3. Sire.
